column2: Your signal has been received. You are greeted by a combat drone, system GU- *the voice module suddenly glitches, and for a few seconds you only hear incomprehensible noises* -zar: Be Ahead! What is the purpose of your call?
Query not understood. Rephrase your query.
How many enemies have you destroyed?
All right. Nevermind. Over and out.
How many enemies have you destroyed?
Weapon systems charge: twenty percent. Damage dealt to the enemy: calculation impossible.
Returning to the Hakazar Company warehouse. Hakazar: Be Ahead.
How many enemies have you destroyed?
In that case, good l- Oh, you won't get it, anyway. Over and out.
